model_info.description: Gemma 3 27B-IT is Google's instruction-tuned open model with 27 billion parameters, released in 2025. Built on Gemini 2.0 research, it features a 128K token context window, supports 140+ languages, and handles multimodal inputs (text and images). Optimized for conversational AI and task completion, it is available in quantized formats for efficient deployment.
use_cases: Conversational AI and multi-turn dialogue systems
Multimodal tasks combining text and images
strengths: 128K token context window (16x larger than Gemma 2) for long document analysis
Multimodal support for text and image inputs
Instruction-tuned for conversational AI and task completion
Available in quantized formats (4-bit/5-bit/8-bit) for efficient deployment
Outperforms Llama3-405B and DeepSeek-V3 in LMSys Chatbot Arena (Elo 1339)
Based on Gemini 2.0 research for advanced capabilities
limitations: Requires significant computational resources (16-32GB RAM for quantized versions)
No access to real-time data or current events
Quantized versions may sacrifice some accuracy for efficiency
